message: Hello Tamara Thorpe & Dustin Puehler ! I've drafted our product idea template and it is now ready for your review, changes and insights. You will find the file in our shared Teams space.

Another thought: Introducing Digital Accessibility and Other Best Practices for Remote Work: https://disabilityin.org/resources2/covid-19-response-accessible-tools-and-content/ (https://disabilityin.org/resources2/covid-19-response-accessible-tools-and-content/)
Morning team! I'd like to start a conversation here so we're ready for Friday's lab.
Added a new tab at the top of this channel. Here's a link.

Fantastic job my friends! You're all AMAZING!! I apologize for the glitches with the PPT - there was an animation that kept throwing the deck forward. Note to self - I'll be sure to check on that next time. Thank you so much for all that you've done to make this happen.

Conner Williams Grace Vottero Hi Friends! In the files section of this channel, I have uploaded a spreadsheet of clients not listed as "Active." When you are able, can you please review the list and add your name to any clients that you would LOVE to work with or that you already have a relationship with. Also, if you could please, alert me if you know other consultants are working on anything here. No need to dive deep on looking at who is doing what with these; just looking for your gut reactions on the names. Let me know when you're finished. I'll assign the remainders and share instructions on next steps. HAPPY FRIDAY!
I added a tab at the top of this channel. Check it out!
For the dress rehearsal let's use the same link as yesterday - https://languageandculture.zoom.us/my/rebparrillazoom (https://languageandculture.zoom.us/my/rebparrillazoom)

Tamara Thorpe I am looking at your Learning Journey Overview and am loving it! To be consistent, I'm copying the 'focus' and 'expected outcomes' language to each of the detailed learning journey slides so they match exactly.
USOPC Presentation Team The deck has been updated. Please look through your section to ensure all edits were made...and please clear all comments that no longer apply.
I changed our previously pretty bland PPT prez title to: "Co-Creating a Sustainable DE&I Ecosystem with the USOPC"
Hi, I created a Wiki (above) where we can add our questions for USOPC as we think of them. I added the first one.

Kelly Salek and Melissa Neu how can we make the journey screenshots on slides 18-27 sharper and clearer? Can we copy and paste from the original PPT? The images are a bit fuzzy and become fuzzier when you display in slideshow mode. Thank you!

Rebecca Parrilla Tamara Thorpe Chuck Adams If you are curious as to how the pricing breaks out year over year, it is laid out in Compass here: https://lcw.scoro.com/quotes/view/934 (https://lcw.scoro.com/quotes/view/934)

Rebecca Parrilla Melissa Neu Any thoughts on what elearning to demo? Elearning and microlearning demo? Was thinking about IMUB the new version (uses more iconography) but I really love Culture & Identity (has more visuals)...Thoughts?
Please note that I've added to the files the Team USA Council on Racial and Social Justice Recommendations for Antiracism and Acts of Discrimination

I can collaborate with the "High level overview of proposed solutions" slides (Chuck) and the "Detail of Curriculum/Learning Paths" slides (Tamara). Will look at these slides and insert any comments directly into the presentation on Teams.....
Hi, all. I uploaded my thoughts in the Files section of this team.

Alisa Kolodizner Kelly Salek Chuck Adams Tamara Thorpe - we weren't able to discuss who is taking what sections. Let's use this chat to coordinate. I'll be kicking off the call and passing it to you... who's on first?

Olympic Host Cities Winter 2026 - Milan–Cortina d'Ampezzo, Italy Summer 2024 – Paris France 2028 - Los Angeles, California Paralympic Host Cities 2024 – Paris France 2026 - Milan–Cortina d'Ampezzo, Italy 2028 - Los Angeles, California Pan Am Host Cities 2023 – Santiago, Chile 2027 – Barranquilla, Colombia Parapan AM Host Cities 2023 – Santiago, Chile 2027 – Barranquilla, Colombia Youth Olympic Host Cities 2024 – Gangwon, South Korea 2026 – Dakar, Senegal

Alisa Kolodizner Rebecca Parrilla Tamara Thorpe Chuck Adams Kelly Salek - The draft deck is in the files section of this shared working space. Ideally, we can work in parallel using Teams. Remember, the deck as it exists is essentially a placeholder, and I'm looking to each of you to either provide me with guidance on changes or to take ownership of your assigned sections.
